client

Class TCPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.TCPClient

  • public class TCPClient
extends java.lang.Object
    TCPClient defines the client that will connect to the Server using the TCP protocol

    A TCPClient instance is characterized by the following :

    • A port to plug in
    • A serverName to refer to
    • A server socket
    • An output PrintStream to send data
    • An input BufferedReader to receive data
    Author:
    Quentin Ducasse

        public TCPClient(java.lang.String serverName,

        Through construction, the TCPClient simply gathers a given port and server name

        Parameters:

        port - The port the client will go through
